text: The Peoria Rivermen were an American professional ice hockey team that played in the American Hockey League from 2005 to 2013. They play in Peoria, Illinois at the Carver Arena. The AHL announced that on June 14, 2013, the Rivermen franchise would relocate to Utica, New York and be known as the Utica Comets for the 2013-14 AHL season. ==References== ==Other websites== * Peoria Rivermen Official Site Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Defunct American Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:St. Louis Blues Category:2005 establishments in Illinois Category:2013 disestablishments in the United States Category:21st-century disestablishments in Illinois
title: Peoria Rivermen
